Control Name: 2.5 Ensure that the log metric filter and alerts exist for Audit Configuration changes
Control Statement: Google Cloud Platform (GCP) services write audit log entries to the Admin Activity and Data Access logs to help answer the questions of, who did what, where, and when? within GCP projects.
